comment: Great kalimari and squid soup!
The food was great, but the waiting times are just too long to justify coming here unfortunately :(
Didn't offer fish and chips, outraged!
The only pizza available had very little seafood on it, as a pizza connoisseur this upsets me greatly
As a restaurant owner myself I know a tight ship when I see one, and Gamba is absolutely terrific with its service too!
Food was stellar and there was no end of options to choose from, but in the evenings the place gets very noisy.
ok.
Great family meal, they have good kids options that weren't too expensive. May well come here again, would recommend.
Their kalimari really is excellent, anyone who likes seafood should come here!
The waiting times killed the experience for me, but the food was great when it eventually did arrive
I went there for lunch and the service and food were just the best, nothing to complain about here!
Charged me Â£8.25 for two cups of coffee and a muffin. Yet another rubbish, overpriced West End coffeehouse!
Very modern and vibrant atmosphere here, the amount of coffee could sometimes be a tad too small for me though
Very expensive but they do know how to make your coffee at the perfect pressure and temperature!
Love coming across the road here before I open my shop at lunchtime, always wakes me up very well :)
The food smelled great, they did give me too many onions though. Just a couple of slices would have been fine.
Favourite vegan place!
Absolutely vile! Never go there
Mid tier restaurant, don't recommend to be honest.
Great atmosphere, they did charge a lot for that and the beer though...
